fields.name: Pop
fields.description: Popular music is a genre of music that produces the most hits, a hit being a song or recording that sells many copies.

fields.name: Rock
fields.description: Rock music is a genre that evolved from 1940s and 1950s rock and roll, and includes a diverse range of subgenres.

fields.name: Hip-Hop
fields.description: Hip-Hop is a culture and art movement that emerged in the Bronx in New York City during the early 1970s.
